title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 673.10 - Recordkeeping and response to request for records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 673.10 - Recordkeeping and response to request for records

State Regulations
(a) The owner of any dam shall keep available
and in good order all available records of: (1)
original construction; and
(2)
modifications to a dam's design and
construction. (b) A dam
owner shall keep available and in good order all records required to be
prepared by this Part. (c) The
department may require any dam owner to furnish, upon reasonable notice and at
the owner's sole expense, copies of any records required to be maintained by
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
673.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
